hero.name: Ronan PLUTA FONTAINE
hero.description: Computer Science Master's Student | Software Developer seeking apprenticeship (September 2025) for 2 weeks in company and 2 weeks in education.

about.currently: Currently pursuing a Master's in Computer Science at the University of Poitiers (specializing in Software Development & Big Data), I am seeking a 12-month apprenticeship starting September 2025. Passionate about agility, automation, and software quality, I apply my skills in Java, React, and REST API development.
about.experience: My experience at Axelor allowed me to develop skills in process automation and API integration.
about.location: Based in Poitiers, I am mobile in Paris and Montpellier. My technical profile combines backend skills (Java, APIs, Databases) and frontend (React, TypeScript) with a methodical approach to software projects.
